toolset.name: File Manager
toolset.description: Provides tools for direct file and directory manipulation (create, read, edit, delete, copy, move, find, history).

config.prompt_limit: Enter max number of history items to show
config.warn_invalid: Invalid number entered. Using previous/default limit.
config.error_save_failed: Failed to save File Manager configuration.

path.path_desc: The absolute or relative path to the file or directory.

create.path_desc: The absolute or relative path for the new file or directory.
create.content_desc: Optional text content to write if creating a file.
create.is_directory_desc: Set to true if creating a directory, false (default) for a file.

edit_simple.path_desc: The path to the file to edit.
edit_simple.find_text_desc: The exact text content to find within the file.
edit_simple.replace_text_desc: The text content to replace the 'find_text' with.
edit_simple.summary_desc: A brief summary of the edit being performed.

from_to.from_path_desc: The source path of the file or directory.

rename.path_desc: The current path of the file or directory to rename.
rename.new_name_desc: The desired new name for the file or directory (just the final component, not the full path).

find.query_desc: The filename or directory name pattern to search for.
find.directory_desc: Optional directory to start the search from (defaults to current working directory). Search includes subdirectories.

usage_guide.name: file_manager_usage_guide
usage_guide.description: Displays usage instructions and context for the File Manager toolset.

create.name: create_file_or_dir
create.description: Creates a new file or directory at the specified path. Optionally writes content if creating a file.

error.content_for_dir: Error: Cannot provide content when creating a directory: {path}

read.name: read_file_content
read.description: Reads the content of a specified file as text.

error.not_file: Error: Path is not a file or does not exist: {path}

delete.name: delete_file_or_dir
delete.description: Deletes a specified file or directory. Requires user confirmation.

edit.name: edit_file
edit.description: Edits a file by replacing occurrences of 'find_text' with 'replace_text'. Creates a backup first. Requires user confirmation of the edit summary and target file.

error.not_file: Error: Path is not a file or does not exist: {path}

edit.info_no_change: Edit completed on {path}. No changes made (find_text not found?). Original file untouched. No backup created.

copy.name: copy_file_or_dir
copy.description: Copies a file or directory from 'from_path' to 'to_path'. Requires user confirmation of the source path.

error.source_not_exists: Error: Source path does not exist: {path}
error.dest_exists: Error: Destination path already exists: {path}. Overwriting not supported.

move.name: move_file_or_dir
move.description: Moves (renames) a file or directory from 'from_path' to 'to_path'. Requires user confirmation of the source path.

error.source_not_exists: Error: Source path does not exist: {path}
error.dest_exists: Error: Destination path already exists: {path}. Overwriting not supported.

rename.name: rename_file_or_dir
rename.description: Renames a file or directory within the same parent directory. Requires user confirmation of the new name.

error.invalid_new_name: Error: 'new_name' ({new_name}) cannot contain path separators. Use 'move_file_or_dir' to move between directories.
error.empty_new_name: Error: Confirmed new name cannot be empty.
error.path_not_exists: Error: Original path does not exist: {path}

find.name: find_files
find.description: Searches for files or directories matching the query within a specified directory (or current directory) and its subdirectories.

error.dir_not_found: Error: Search directory does not exist or is not a directory: {directory}

find.info_no_matches: No files or directories found matching '{query}' in {directory}.
find.error_permission: Error: Permission denied while searching in {directory}.

check_exist.name: check_path_exists
check_exist.description: Checks if a given file or directory path exists in the file system.

history.name: show_file_change_history
history.description: Displays the recent history of file operations performed by this toolset in the current chat.
history.info_empty: No file operations recorded in history for this chat.

restore.name: restore_file_from_backup
restore.description: Restores a file to the state saved in its most recent backup created by the 'edit_file' tool. Requires user confirmation.

error.no_backup_history: Error: No backup found in history for file: {path}
error.backup_missing: Error: Backup file recorded in history does not exist: {backup_path}
error.target_not_file: Error: Target path exists but is not a file: {path}

finalize.name: finalize_file_changes
finalize.description: Deletes all backup files created by this toolset in the current chat session.
finalize.info_no_backups: No backup files found to delete.
finalize.success: Finalized file changes. Deleted {deleted_count} of {total_count} backup files.
